title: The Good Land
description: Almost 15-year-old Carolyn, the baby of the Pierce family, is experiencing the growing-up difficulties and frustrations typical of the youngest child. In her attempts to find her own place in the adult world, Carolyn tries to help her older sister in her floundering romance, secretly befriends the daughter of an unfriendly homesteader, and discovers that words, her words, can make a difference in others lives. Recommended by Seton Home Study Grade 5, Seton Home Study Grade 6 Bethlehem Books 185 pages, paperback 978-1932350135 9-12
author: Loula Grace Erdman
